You basically only need three things to happen.  1) Have the IP set within the proper range that router is using.  2) Set the router's IP as default gateway, (sudo /sbin/route add default gw 192.168.1.1). 3) Add proper nameserver IP addresses to resolv.conf, (nameserver 208.67.222.222)
